page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: I like to golf whenever I have free time.I usually golf on Saturdays.I go to St.Andrew's,twelve miles away.The golf course I play on is called the Balgove golf course.Sometimes I go fishing on the River Tay.I have caught several eels,flounders,and sea _ trout there.I also enjoy playing football. When I don't have much to do I go to the woods and play on the dirt _ track there on my motor _ bike.I also have a BMX bicycle and I enjoy doing stunts and jumps on it.If I have nothing to do I just sit at home and watch television. by James Drummond and George Thomson. -------------------
